thread.title: Gavin Taylor
thread.title_full: The Official ECCO Shop recenserad av Gavin Taylor

author: Gavin Taylor
title: Gavin Taylor
text: This was my second shoe order - ECCO offer superb quality and stylish footwear. I purchased sandals and walking boots - all extremely comfortable and of high quality. Having a removable insole is invaluable on trainers and boots as I need an orthotic insole as suffer from plantar fasciitis. A happy shopping experience!
